transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: Penetrating Tentacles
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000017_1_1]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000017_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Invocation of Evil
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to the caster and the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

description: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to the caster and the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000017_2_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Quo Vadis
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nThe strength of the barriers increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000017_3_1] turn(s)</color>.\nThe strength of the barriers increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Attack for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000017_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Attack for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000017_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000017_backup_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000017_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
